verbs.description: robotize (third-person singular simple present robotizes, present participle robotizing, simple past and past participle robotized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To give something (or someone) the characteristics of a robot.
examples: They have fought the robotizing of their characters to a kind of stand-off.

entries.meaning: (transitive) To automate, especially by making use of robots.
examples: " […] And maybe one works, but in the long run what it does is it robotizes the process.”
